meanings.definition: (adj.) relating to or denoting a method of mining in which coal or ore is extracted from the surface of the ground.
meanings.sent1: The miners used opencast methods to extract coal from the ground.
meanings.sent2: The opencast mining operation was visible from afar.
meanings.sent3: The opencast mine looked like a giant scar on the earth's surface.
meanings.sent4: The opencast landscape revealed the hidden treasures beneath.
meanings.sent5: The opencast process made the mining operation more efficient.

meanings.definition: (v.) to extract (coal or ore) from the surface of the ground.
meanings.sent1: They decided to opencast the coal to meet the demand.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to opencast a new ore deposit next month.
meanings.sent3: The miners opencasted the area with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: She opencast the valuable minerals like a skilled professional.
meanings.sent5: Opencasting the resources revealed their true potential.
